name: ui/media-block
title: Media Block
description: Generic media block. Can be either a video or an image.

autoplay.name: Autoplay
autoplay.description: When present, it specifies that the media should start playing automatically. For more info: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_video_autoplay.asp

fullHeight.name: Full Height
fullHeight.description: When present, it specifies that the media should be full height.

objectFit.name: Object Fit
objectFit.description: The object-fit CSS property sets how the content of an element should be resized to fit its container. For more info: https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_object-fit.asp
